member.name: T:Gemstone.Threading.ConcurrencyLimiter
member.summary: Task scheduler that limits the number of tasks that can execute in parallel at any given time.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.ConcurrencyLimiter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with a and a maximum concurrency level equal to the number of processors on the current machine.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.ConcurrencyLimiter.#ctor(Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.SynchronizedOperationFactory)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with a maximum concurrency level equal to the number of processors on the current machine.
member.param: Factory function for creating the synchronized operations to be used for processing tasks.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.ConcurrencyLimiter.#ctor(Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.SynchronizedOperationFactory,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.param: Factory function for creating the synchronized operations to be used for processing tasks.
The initial value for .

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.ConcurrencyLimiter.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with a .
member.param: The initial value for .

member.name: P:Gemstone.Threading.ConcurrencyLimiter.CurrentConcurrencyLevel
member.summary: Gets the number of threads that are currently executing tasks concurrently.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.ConcurrencyLimiter.GetScheduledTasks
member.summary: For debugger support only, generates an enumerable of instances currently queued to the scheduler waiting to be executed.
member.returns: An enumerable that allows a debugger to traverse the tasks currently queued to this scheduler.

member.name: P:Gemstone.Threading.ConcurrencyLimiter.MaximumConcurrencyLevel
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of threads that can be executing tasks concurrently.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.ConcurrencyLimiter.QueueTask(System.Threading.Tasks.Task)
member.summary: Queues a to the scheduler.
member.param: The to be queued.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.ConcurrencyLimiter.SetMaximumConcurrencyLevel(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the maximum number of threads that can be executing tasks concurrently.
member.param: The maximum concurrency level.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.ConcurrencyLimiter.TryExecuteTaskInline(System.Threading.Tasks.Task,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines whether the provided can be executed synchronously in this call, and if it can, executes it.
member.param: The to be executed.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the task was executed inline.

member.name: T:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessLock
member.summary: Defines helper methods related to inter-process locking.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessLock.GetNamedMutex(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a uniquely named inter-process associated with the running application, typically used to detect whether an instance of the application is already running.
member.param: Indicates whether to generate a different name for the dependent upon the user running the application.
member.returns: A uniquely named inter-process specific to the application; is created if it does not exist.
member.exception: The named mutex exists, but the user does not have the minimum needed security access rights to use it.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessLock.GetNamedMutex(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a uniquely named inter-process associated with the specified that identifies a source object needing concurrency locking.
member.param: Identifying name of source object needing concurrency locking (e.g., a path and file name).
Determines if mutex should be marked as global; set value to false for local.
member.returns: A uniquely named inter-process specific to ; is created if it does not exist.
member.exception: Argument cannot be empty, null or white space.
The named mutex exists, but the user does not have the minimum needed security access rights to use it.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessLock.GetNamedSemaphore(System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a uniquely named inter-process associated with the running application, typically used to detect whether some number of instances of the application are already running.
member.param: Indicates whether to generate a different name for the dependent upon the user running the application.
The maximum number of requests for the semaphore that can be granted concurrently.
The initial number of requests for the semaphore that can be granted concurrently, or -1 to default to .
member.returns: A uniquely named inter-process specific to entry assembly; is created if it does not exist.
member.exception: The named semaphore exists, but the user does not have the minimum needed security access rights to use it.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessLock.GetNamedSemaphore(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a uniquely named inter-process associated with the specified that identifies a source object needing concurrency locking.
member.param: Identifying name of source object needing concurrency locking (e.g., a path and file name).
The maximum number of requests for the semaphore that can be granted concurrently.
The initial number of requests for the semaphore that can be granted concurrently, or -1 to default to .
Determines if semaphore should be marked as global; set value to false for local.
member.returns: A uniquely named inter-process specific to ; is created if it does not exist.
member.exception: Argument cannot be empty, null or white space.
The named semaphore exists, but the user does not have the minimum needed security access rights to use it.

member.name: T:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessReaderWriterLock
member.summary: Represents an inter-process reader/writer lock using and native locking mechanisms.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessReaderWriterLock.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the associated with the specified that identifies a source object needing concurrency locking.
member.param: Identifying name of source object needing concurrency locking (e.g., a path and file name).
Determines if semaphore and mutex used by should be marked as global; set value to false for local.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessReaderWriterLock.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the associated with the specified that identifies a source object needing concurrency locking.
member.param: Identifying name of source object needing concurrency locking (e.g., a path and file name).
Maximum concurrent reader locks to allow.
Determines if semaphore and mutex used by should be marked as global; set value to false for local.

member.name: F:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessReaderWriterLock.DefaultMaximumConcurrentLocks
member.summary: Default maximum concurrent locks allowed for .

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessReaderWriterLock.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all the resources used by the object.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessReaderWriterLock.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessReaderWriterLock.EnterReadLock
member.summary: Tries to enter the lock in read mode.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessReaderWriterLock.EnterWriteLock
member.summary: Tries to enter the lock in write mode.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessReaderWriterLock.ExitReadLock
member.summary: Exits read mode and returns the prior read lock count.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessReaderWriterLock.ExitWriteLock
member.summary: Exits write mode.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessReaderWriterLock.Finalize
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources before the object is reclaimed by .

member.name: P:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessReaderWriterLock.MaximumConcurrentLocks
member.summary: Gets the maximum concurrent reader locks allowed.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessReaderWriterLock.TryEnterReadLock(System.Int32)
member.summary: Tries to enter the lock in read mode, with an optional time-out.
member.param: The number of milliseconds to wait, or -1 () to wait indefinitely.
member.returns: true if the calling thread entered read mode, otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.InterprocessReaderWriterLock.TryEnterWriteLock(System.Int32)
member.summary: Tries to enter the lock in write mode, with an optional time-out.
member.param: The number of milliseconds to wait, or -1 () to wait indefinitely.
member.returns: true if the calling thread entered write mode, otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.Collections.PriorityQueue`1.CopyTo(`0[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies the elements to an existing one-dimensional , starting at the specified array index.
member.param: The one-dimensional that is the destination of the elements copied from the . The must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
member.exception: array is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
index is equal to or greater than the length of the array -or- The number of elements in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.

member.summary: Enqueues an item into the priority queue.

The priority at which the item should be queued. Larger numbers have higher priority!

member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .

member.summary: Copies the elements stored in the to a new array.

member.summary: Dequeues an item from the priority queue.

The item that was dequeued, or the default value if no item was dequeued.
member.returns: True if an item was dequeued; false if the queue is empty.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.Collections.PriorityQueue`1.TryDequeue(`0@)
member.summary: Dequeues an item from the priority queue.

member.returns: True if an item was dequeued; false if the queue is empty.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.Collections.PriorityQueue`1.TryPeek(System.Int32,`0@)
member.summary: Tries to return an object from the beginning of the without removing it.
member.param: The priority at which to peek into the queue.
When this method returns, result contains an object from the beginning of the or an unspecified value if the operation failed.
member.returns: true if an object was returned successfully; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Tries to return an object from the beginning of the without removing it.
member.param: When this method returns, result contains an object from the beginning of the or an unspecified value if the operation failed.
member.returns: true if an object was returned successfully; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets a used to queue tasks at a specific priority.

member.summary: Schedules tasks in a FIFO queue and executes them in a synchronized asynchronous loop.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with a .

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.Strands.Strand.TryExecuteTaskInline(System.Threading.Tasks.Task,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Attempts to executes a task inline, but only if this method is called on the processing thread to avoid parallel execution of tasks.
member.param: The to be executed.
member.returns: A Boolean value indicating whether the task was executed inline.

member.name: T:Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.DelayedSynchronizedOperation
member.summary: Represents a short-running synchronized operation that cannot run while it is already in progress. Async operations will execute on the thread-pool after the specified in milliseconds.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.param: The action to be performed during this operation.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.DelayedSynchronizedOperation.#ctor(System.Action,System.Action{System.Exception})
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.param: The action to be performed during this operation.
The action to be performed if an exception is thrown from the action.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.DelayedSynchronizedOperation.#ctor(System.Action{System.Threading.CancellationToken})
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.param: The cancellable action to be performed during this operation.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.DelayedSynchronizedOperation.#ctor(System.Action{System.Threading.CancellationToken},System.Action{System.Exception})
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.param: The cancellable action to be performed during this operation.
The action to be performed if an exception is thrown from the action.

member.name: F:Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.DelayedSynchronizedOperation.DefaultDelay
member.summary: Defines the default value for the property.

member.name: P:Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.DelayedSynchronizedOperation.Delay
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time to wait before execution, in milliseconds, for any asynchronous calls. Zero value will execute immediately.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.DelayedSynchronizedOperation.ExecuteActionAsync
member.summary: Executes the action on a separate thread after the specified .

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.DelayedSynchronizedOperation.Factory(System.Action)
member.summary: Factory method to match the signature.
member.param: The action to be performed by the .
member.returns: A new instance of with of 1000 milliseconds.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.DelayedSynchronizedOperation.Run(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Executes the action on another thread after the specified in milliseconds or marks the operation as pending if the operation is already running. Method same as for .
member.param: Defines synchronization mode for running any pending operation; must be false for .

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.DelayedSynchronizedOperation.RunAsync
member.summary: Executes the action on another thread after the specified in milliseconds or marks the operation as pending if the operation is already running

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.DelayedSynchronizedOperation.TryRun(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Attempts to execute the action on another thread after the specified in milliseconds. Does nothing if the operation is already running. Method same as for .
member.param: Defines synchronization mode for running any pending operation; must be false for .

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.DelayedSynchronizedOperation.TryRunAsync
member.summary: Attempts to execute the action on another thread after the specified in milliseconds. Does nothing if the operation is already running.

member.name: T:Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.ISynchronizedOperation
member.summary: Represents an operation that cannot run while it is already in progress.

member.name: P:Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.ISynchronizedOperation.CancellationToken
member.summary: Gets or sets to use for cancelling actions.

member.summary: Gets flag indicating if the synchronized operation has an additional operation that is pending execution after the currently running action has completed.

member.name: P:Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.ISynchronizedOperation.IsRunning
member.summary: Gets flag indicating if the synchronized operation is currently executing its action.

member.summary: Executes the action on current thread or marks the operation as pending if the operation is already running.

member.summary: Executes the action on another thread or marks the operation as pending if the operation is already running.

member.summary: Attempts to execute the action on current thread. Does nothing if the operation is already running.
member.param: Defines synchronization mode for running any pending operation.

member.name: M:Gemstone.Threading.SynchronizedOperations.ISynchronizedOperation.TryRunAsync
member.summary: Attempts to execute the action on another thread. Does nothing if the operation is already running.
